DOC.brief_title: A Sample Collection Study Validate Astute Medical NephroCheck Test Critically Ill Subjects Risk Acute Kidney Injury
DOC.criteria: Males females 21 year age old Subjects must enrol ( first studyspecific sample collection ) within 24 hour ICU admission Subjects enrol ED Floor must admit ICU within 24 hour enrollment Subjects enrol ICU must admit ICU transfer study ICU another ICU 24 hour prior enrollment Expected remain ICU least 48 hour enrollment Use indwelling urinary catheter standard care expect least 48 hour enrollment At least one follow acute condition document within 24 hour prior enrollment Respiratory SOFA score ≥ 2 ( PaO2/FiO2 < 300 ) Cardiovascular SOFA score ≥ 1 ( MAP < 70 mm Hg and/or vasopressor require Subject ( authorized representative ) able willing provide write informed consent study participation . Special population include woman know pregnancy , prisoner institutionalize individual Previous renal transplantation Known moderate severe AKI prior enrollment ( e.g. , RIFLEI RIFLEF/ AKIN 2 AKIN 3 Already receive dialysis ( either acute chronic ) imminent need dialysis time enrollment Known infection human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) active hepatitis ( acute chronic ) Subjects history Chronic Kidney Disease ( CKD ) without baseline serum creatinine value ( baseline within 6 month enrollment )
